section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in 72-5794, David against Alaska for reasons stated in an opinion filed this morning.
The judgment of the Supreme Court of Alaska under review is reversed and remanded.
Mr. Justice Stewart filed a concurring opinion.
Mr. Justice White with whom Mr. Justice Rehnquist joined, filed a dissenting opinion.
